edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers

Class DynamicLayerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.LayerInfo
        • edu.ucdavis.cstars.client.layers.DynamicLayerInfo

  • public class DynamicLayerInfo
extends LayerInfo
    Class added v2.7 Information about each layer in a map service. This class extends the esri.layers.LayerInfo class with a new property source which can be either a esri.layers.LayerMapSource or a esri.layers.LayerDataSource.
    Author:
    Justin Merz
